game.title: The Lost Key
game.objective: Find and return the lost key to the quest giver.
game.description: The key to the city's treasure chest has been stolen! Search for it in the nearby forest.

task.objective: Speak to Morgan Le Fay at her castle in the forest.
task.description: Morgan Le Fay will provide more details about the lost key and its location.

task.objective: Search the forest for any clues about the lost key's whereabouts.
task.description: Use your detective skills to find and follow the trail that leads to the lost key.

task.objective: Return the lost key to Morgan Le Fay at her castle.
task.description: Present the key to Morgan Le Fay to receive your reward and complete the quest.
